overview: The story of the film is about a man who is looking for his real identity and his constant question is, who am I?. And this can be the question of each of us, Who are we?. He misses the chance to live with a girl because of the Islamic revolution in Iran. After his mother's death, he discovers that his real parents are not those that have raised him. During his search for his real parents or real his identity, he discovers a strange and shocking story about his childhood strange and shocking story about his childhood.
title: Who are we?
